application: the correlation between the wealth of a married person and the wealth of their spouse for all the married couples in New York.
the correlation between the square footage of the house and the square footage of the carpeting in the house for homes in New York.
the correlation between the length of the movie and its box office receipts for the movies played at a 16 theater complex.
the correlation between the year a car was manufactured and the odometer reading for all the cars registered in New York.
